response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I believe its true worth surpasses the conventional market standards and aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its significance, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the product's tangible value but also its intangible benefits that could potentially enrich your life or business in ways unforeseen.

Please consider this offer thoughtfully. Should you find it within your budget and interests, I would be honored to facilitate the transaction and ensure a smooth process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
